taggedTemplateStringWithSymbolExpression01.ts(6,28): error TS2731: Implicit conversion of a 'symbol' to a 'string' will fail at runtime. Consider wrapping this expression in 'String(...)'.


==== taggedTemplateStringWithSymbolExpression01.ts (1 errors) ====
    // taggedTemplateStringWithSymbolExpression01.ts
    
    declare function foo(template: any, val: symbol): number;
    let x!: symbol;
    
    let result: number = foo`${x}`;
                               ~
!!! error TS2731: Implicit conversion of a 'symbol' to a 'string' will fail at runtime. Consider wrapping this expression in 'String(...)'.
